clobber.name: clobber
clobber.description: hard resets to HEAD of origin and cleans the local repo

steps.say: ready to rock! (unpushed commits are under the "scratch" branch)

typecheck-python.name: typecheck-python
typecheck-python.description: Check Python types for tilediiif.* packages.

format-python-code.name: format-python-code
format-python-code.description: Format Python code of tilediiif.* packages.

ci:setup.name: ci:setup
ci:setup.description: Prepare the checked out project for running CI tasks without running a projen synth, e.g. install dependencies

create-release:tilediiif.core.name: create-release:tilediiif.core
create-release:tilediiif.core.description: Generate a tagged release commit for tilediiif.core using standard-version

ensure-checkout-is-releaseable:tilediiif.name: ensure-checkout-is-releaseable:tilediiif.core
ensure-checkout-is-releaseable:tilediiif.description: Fail with an error if the working copy is not a clean checkout of a tilediiif.core release tag.

steps.exec:
test "$(git rev-parse HEAD)" == "$(git rev-parse tags/tilediiif.core-v0.1.0^{commit})" \
          && test "$(git status --porcelain)" == "" \
          || (echo "Error: the git checkout must be clean and tagged as tilediiif.core-v0.1.0" 1>&2; exit 1)

\
        cd "tilediiif.core" \
        && poetry run mypy --namespace-packages \
          -p tilediiif.core \
          -p tests
cd "tilediiif.core" && poetry run isort . ; poetry run black . ; poetry run flake8

create-release:tilediiif.tools.name: create-release:tilediiif.tools
create-release:tilediiif.tools.description: Generate a tagged release commit for tilediiif.tools using standard-version

ensure-checkout-is-releaseable:tilediiif.name: ensure-checkout-is-releaseable:tilediiif.tools
ensure-checkout-is-releaseable:tilediiif.description: Fail with an error if the working copy is not a clean checkout of a tilediiif.tools release tag.

steps.exec:
test "$(git rev-parse HEAD)" == "$(git rev-parse tags/tilediiif.tools-v0.1.0^{commit})" \
          && test "$(git status --porcelain)" == "" \
          || (echo "Error: the git checkout must be clean and tagged as tilediiif.tools-v0.1.0" 1>&2; exit 1)

\
        cd "tilediiif.tools" \
        && poetry run mypy --namespace-packages \
          -p tilediiif.tools \
          -p tests -p integration_tests
cd "tilediiif.tools" && poetry run isort . ; poetry run black . ; poetry run flake8

create-release:docker:tilediiif.tools-sl.name: create-release:docker:tilediiif.tools-slim
create-release:docker:tilediiif.tools-sl.description: Generate a tagged release commit for docker:tilediiif.tools-slim using standard-version

steps.exec:
git worktree add --detach "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" "docker/tilediiif.tools-slim-v0.1.1" \
&& cd "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" \
&& docker image build \
  --file "docker/images/tilediiif.tools-slim/Dockerfile" \
  --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:v0.1.0-slim" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:v0.1-slim" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:v0-slim" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:image-v0.1.1-slim" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:image-v0.1-slim" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:image-v0-slim" \
  --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_TOOLS_SHA=tags/tilediiif.tools-v0.1.0" --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_CORE_SHA=tags/tilediiif.core-v0.1.0" \
  --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=0.1.1 (tilediiif.tools=0.1.0, tilediiif.core=0.1.0)" --label "org.opencontainers.image.revision=$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)" --label "org.opencontainers.image.title=tilediiif.tools slim" --label "org.opencontainers.image.description=The tilediiif.tools Python package." \
   \
  --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:v0.1.0-slim" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:v0.1-slim" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:v0-slim" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:image-v0.1.1-slim" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:image-v0.1-slim" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif.tools:image-v0-slim" \
  --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
  "$GIT_DIR" \
&& cd - \
&& git worktree remove "$VERSION_CHECKOUT"

create-release:docker:tilediiif.tools-pa.description: Generate a tagged release commit for docker:tilediiif.tools-parallel using standard-version

  --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_TOOLS_SHA=tags/tilediiif.tools-v0.1.0" --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_CORE_SHA=tags/tilediiif.core-v0.1.0" \

  --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_AWSLAMBDA_SHA=tags/tilediiif.awslambda-v0.1.0" --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_TOOLS_SHA=tags/tilediiif.tools-v0.1.0" --build-arg "TILEDIIIF_CORE_SHA=tags/tilediiif.core-v0.1.0" \

create-release:docker:tilediiif-dev.name: create-release:docker:tilediiif-dev
create-release:docker:tilediiif-dev.description: Generate a tagged release commit for docker:tilediiif-dev using standard-version

steps.exec:
git worktree add --detach "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" "docker/tilediiif-dev-v0.1.5" \
&& cd "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" \
&& docker image build \
  --file "docker/images/dev/Dockerfile" \
  --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1.5-tools" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1-tools" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0-tools" \
   \
  --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=0.1.5" --label "org.opencontainers.image.revision=$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)" --label "org.opencontainers.image.title=tilediiif development environment." \
  --target "tools-dev" \
  --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1.5-tools" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1-tools" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0-tools" \
  --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
  "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" \
&& docker image build \
  --file "docker/images/dev/Dockerfile" \
  --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1.5-tools-without-mozjpeg" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1-tools-without-mozjpeg" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0-tools-without-mozjpeg" \
  --build-arg "VIPS_USE_MOZJPEG=" \
  --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=0.1.5" --label "org.opencontainers.image.revision=$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)" --label "org.opencontainers.image.title=tilediiif development environment (without mozjpeg installed)." \
  --target "tools-dev" \
  --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1.5-tools-without-mozjpeg" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1-tools-without-mozjpeg" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0-tools-without-mozjpeg" \
  --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
  "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" \
&& docker image build \
  --file "docker/images/dev/Dockerfile" \
  --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1.5-tools-with-broken-mozjpeg" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1-tools-with-broken-mozjpeg" --tag "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0-tools-with-broken-mozjpeg" \
   \
  --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=0.1.5" --label "org.opencontainers.image.revision=$(git rev-parse --verify HEAD)" --label "org.opencontainers.image.title=tilediiif-dev-env (broken mozjpeg)" --label "org.opencontainers.image.description=tilediiif development environment (with vips built for mozjpeg, but mozjpeg unavailable)." \
  --target "tools-dev-with-broken-mozjpeg" \
  --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1.5-tools-with-broken-mozjpeg" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0.1-tools-with-broken-mozjpeg" --cache-from "ghcr.io/cambridge-collection/tilediiif/dev-environment:v0-tools-with-broken-mozjpeg" \
  --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 \
  "$VERSION_CHECKOUT" \
&& cd - \
&& git worktree remove "$VERSION_CHECKOUT"
